rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Vestibule
rooms.description: A welcoming open space with a Bohemian aesthetic featuring bohemian art, warm colors, and reclaimed materials. Vastu-aligned entry that allows positive energy flow.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: An expansive space decorated with eclectic furniture, vibrant textiles, and bohemian motifs. Vastu alignment ensures a harmonious flow from the entrance.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A cozy area adjacent to the living room, ideal for communal meals. Incorporates natural elements and handcrafted decor in line with Bohemian design.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed to integrate traditional Indian elements with bohemian touches. Incorporates energy-efficient appliances and a Vastu-aligned layout to ensure positive flow.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: A spacious bedroom with natural light, bohemian decor including textiles and handcrafted furnishings. Vastu principles ensure a peaceful sleep environment.

rooms.name: Ensuite Bathroom
rooms.description: A bathroom attached to the Master Bedroom, designed with modern fixtures and natural finishes.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable guest room that reflects bohemian style through vibrant color palettes and ethnic accessories. Vastu principles considered for harmony.

rooms.name: Second Bedroom
rooms.description: Additional bedroom designed with flexible space to serve as a study or playroom, incorporating bohemian elements and adaptable furnishing.

rooms.name: Home Theater
rooms.description: A dedicated entertainment area with soundproofing and ambient lighting that complements the apartment's bohemian aesthetic. Vastu alignment ensures energy positivity.

rooms.name: Garage
rooms.description: A two-car garage with integrated storage solutions and a Bohemian touch through reclaimed wood finishes and decorative elements. Vastu principles ensure that the space is balanced.

openings.name: Front Door
openings.description: A large, inviting door positioned in the North or East direction according to Vastu principles for optimal energy.

openings.name: Window Placement
openings.description: Strategically placed windows allowing natural light and ventilation, with consideration of Vastu directions for maximum positive flow.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A separate access door for domestic help leading to servant's quarters located in a quieter zone of the apartment. Ensures privacy and adherence to local building norms.
openings.location: Adjacent to the Kitchen / Utility Space

rooms.name: Servant's Quarters
rooms.description: A dedicated living area for domestic help with a kitchenette and private bathroom. Designed with minimalistic bohemian aesthetics, following local building norms.

openings.name: Service Staircase
openings.description: A separate staircase for the servant's quarters ensuring privacy and easy access to both floors.

openings.name: Balcony Access
openings.description: Balconies providing natural ventilation and a view of the surrounding area, designed to enhance living quality.
openings.location: Adjacent to Master Bedroom and Guest Bedrooms
